name: Advanced Crystal Beast Sapphire Pegasus
desc: If "Advanced Dark" is not in a Field Zone, send this monster to the GY. If this card is Summoned: You can place 1 of your "Advanced Crystal Beast" monsters that is banished, or in your hand, Deck, or GY, face-up in your Spell & Trap Zone as a Continuous Spell. If this face-up card is destroyed in a Monster Zone, you can place it face-up in your Spell & Trap Zone as a Continuous Spell, instead of sending it to the GY.
